How can I get information about a specific currency using the Verus JSON-RPC API?

You can get information about a specific currency using the `getcurrency` method of the Verus JSON-RPC API. The basic format of the request is:

`curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getcurrency", "params": ["currencyname"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/`

Replace `"myusername"` with your Verus username, and `"currencyname"` with the name of the currency you want to get information about.

d Examples: > verus getcurrency "currencyname" > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getcurrency", "params": ["currencyname"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
